subject: HNDI
title: Intro to Conversational Hindi
info: Advanced grammatical structures, oral forms, new vocabulary reinforced from lessons around everyday life situations. Oral/written drills, reading for comprehension, audio-visual work.

subject: HNDI
title: Beginning Hindi I
info: Basic listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. Emphasis on the development of communicative competence.

subject: HNDI
title: Beginning Hindi II
info: Basic listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. Emphasizes communicative competence.

subject: HNDI
title: Accelerated Beginning Hindi
info: Aspects of linguistic performance: speaking, reading, writing, listening. Cultural/linguistic literacy about South Asia and, in paricular, India. Emphasizes individual learning styles/preferences for students to understand/retain information.

subject: HNDI
title: Accelerated Hindi
info: Intensive course. Reading, writing, listening, and speaking in various functions and cultural contexts. Focuses on reading/writing.

subject: HNDI
title: Accelerated Intermediate Hindi
info: Conversational aspect of Hindi. Interactive group activities, video/lab sessions. Engaging in reasonably fluent discourse. Formal grammar. Advanced reading, writing, and comprehension. Different genres/styles of spoken/written Hindi. Taught mainly in Hindi.

subject: HNDI
title: Intermediate Hindi I
info: Development of reading, writing, speaking, and listening skills. Grammar review, some basic compositions and oral presentations.

subject: HNDI
title: Intermediate Hindi II
info: Development of reading, writing speaking, and listening skills. Grammar review, some basic compositions and oral presentations.

subject: HNDI
title: Advanced Hindi I
info:
Continued emphasis on development of communication skills, ability to comprehend both written/spoken texts. Speak, read, write in Hindi beyond intermediate level.

prereq: 3022 or instr consent

subject: HNDI
title: Advanced Hindi II
info:
This course is the second half of the Advanced Hindi course sequence. Continued emphasis on development of communication skills, ability to comprehend both written/spoken texts. Speak, read, write in Hindi beyond intermediate level.
